answers.answer: get the test done. if you are pregnant ya need to get care for your baby.and if it is negative, we'll all be here to help ya through it. And you can try again.
Some people just don't get positive urine tests until later in their pregnancy. You might just be early. I would just get the test done so your mind can rest easy. Good luck with everything!

question: Ok, so yesterday I went to the doctor and took a pee test for pregnancy and for a UTI/bladder infection... both came back negative.  Well, the doctor is sending me to get a blood test done today to find out if I'm pregnant, or have diabetes or something else.  I began spotting yesterday after a little romp in the bedroom.  I'm still spotting, however I have a panty liner on, and there are no visible spots on it, I only see the pink when I wipe after urinating. Then last night I had a BM and  it seems to be lasting longer, but still there is none on my panty liner, and only when I wipe.  I am now two weeks late for my period, sure I just give up and assume this is my period?  Or should I go get the blood work done just (I'm being negative like everything else lately) to hear the doctor say I'm not pregnant???? Please help!
title: So frustrated!!!!!
